author: Source: Harwich and Manningtree Standard
title: Jenson Button convinced McLaren will improve next seasonJenson Button ... - Harwich and Manningtree Standard
text:
Jenson Button decided to extend his Formula One career into a 17th season after he was convinced by McLaren that their fortunes will improve next term. Button and his beleaguered McLaren team are in the midst of their worst-ever year, with engine supplier Honda enduring a tortuous return to the grid.
 Harwich and Manningtree Standard.
